item.description:
A New Life Drawing group is forming in the South End at 38 Wareham. Details are as follows:

Contact: Elizabeth Sheppard
email: elizabeth.layton.shepherd@gmail.com
phone: 617-842-4010

The group will meet from 6:30 - 9:30pm. Plenty of space, professional models and a fun environment.

Please RSVP if you intend to attend. Â We are limiting the session to 12 members at the start until we are comfortable with how many people the space can comfortably hold.

Some Easels are available but if you have a portable easel you would like to bring, that would good to bring.
item.name: Life Drawing Group - Tuesday evenings 6:30pm in South End
